transport_scams.description: Auto drivers quote 3-5x normal fare to tourists at airports/stations
transport_scams.safety_advice: Insist on meter. Use Ola/Uber/Rapido. Pre-book airport taxis. Note auto number.
transport_scams.emergency_phrases: Meter chalao (Use meter), Police bulao (Call police)

transport_scams.description: Rigged meters run 2-3x faster than actual speed
transport_scams.safety_advice: Use app cabs. Check route on Google Maps. Verify with hotel staff.

transport_scams.description: Tuk-tuk drivers offer cheap tours but take you to gem shops for commission
transport_scams.scam_rate: 20-50 baht tour that wastes 3 hours at shops
transport_scams.safety_advice: Use Grab/Bolt apps. Agree on price before. Say NO to any shop stops.

transport_scams.description: Rental operators claim fake damages and demand huge payments
transport_scams.safety_advice: Take photos/video before use. Use reputable beaches. Get written agreement. Call tourist police 1155.

transport_scams.description: Taxis at airport/tourist zones charge 5-10x normal rate
transport_scams.safety_advice: Use official airport taxis with fixed rates. Pre-book transfer. Use Uber where available.

transport_scams.description: Unlicensed green taxis involved in robberies
transport_scams.safety_advice: ONLY use pink and white taxis or Uber/Didi. Never hail green taxis on street. Use taxi stands at malls/restaurants.

transport_scams.description: Fake taxis at airports charge 2-3x normal rate
transport_scams.safety_advice: Only use official yellow cabs or app-based rides. Check driver matches app. Taxis must use meter.

transport_scams.description: Taxi takes I-15 instead of surface streets to airport, adding $20-30
transport_scams.safety_advice: Tell driver 'surface streets only, no freeway'. Note taxi number. File complaint if scammed.

transport_scams.description: Unmarked taxis stop at fake police or rob passengers
transport_scams.safety_advice: ONLY use official yellow/white taxis or Uber/99. Never accept rides from airport touts. Pre-book through hotel.

transport_scams.description: Fake card readers installed on ATMs to steal data
transport_scams.safety_advice: Use ATMs inside banks only. Check for loose parts. Cover PIN. Use credit cards when possible.

immediate_actions: Go to crowded public place (mall, restaurant, police station)
Do NOT go to isolated areas
Share live location with trusted contact
Enter nearest shop and ask for help
Loudly say: Stop! Leave me alone!

prevention: Trust your instincts if taste seems off
harassment_safety.symptoms: Sudden drowsiness, confusion, dizziness - seek help IMMEDIATELY

immediate_actions: Don't resist if weapon involved - give items
Memorize details: height, clothing, direction fled

accommodation_scams.description: Driver claims your hotel is closed, takes you to commission hotel
accommodation_scams.safety_advice: Call hotel directly. Show confirmed booking. Refuse alternatives from drivers.

accommodation_scams.description: Hotel claims your booked room unavailable, charges more for upgrade
accommodation_scams.safety_advice: Show booking confirmation. Demand same price or refund. Check reviews beforehand.

accommodation_scams.description: Aggressive timeshare sellers offer free tours/gifts to trap you
accommodation_scams.safety_advice: Politely refuse all timeshare offers. Don't give personal info. Never sign anything.

accommodation_scams.description: Scammers post fake properties, take payment, property doesn't exist
accommodation_scams.safety_advice: Book only through official platforms. Verify host identity. Read all reviews. Never pay outside platform.

accommodation_scams.description: Theft from hostel rooms and lockers
accommodation_scams.safety_advice: Use your own lock. Don't leave valuables. Use hostel safe. Keep passport on you or in room safe.

shopping_scams.description: Scammers convince tourists to buy fake gems to resell abroad
shopping_scams.safety_advice: NEVER buy gems for resale. 100% scam. No exceptions.

shopping_scams.description: Tuk-tuk takes you to tailor, they pressure custom suits at inflated prices, poor quality
shopping_scams.safety_advice: Research tailors beforehand. Don't go with tuk-tuk recommendations. Check reviews online.
Use reputable chains like Farmacia Guadalajara. Avoid street pharmacies. Check packaging carefully.

shopping_scams.description: Costumed characters pose for photos then demand $20-50 payment
shopping_scams.safety_advice: Agree on price before photo. Say no firmly. They can't force you to pay.
Ask price before. Compare with nearby vendors. Bring your own drinks/snacks.

food_safety.guidelines: Eat at busy places. Avoid pre-cut fruits. Drink bottled water only. Choose hot, freshly cooked food.
food_safety.safe_options: Packaged snacks, hot chai, freshly fried items, restaurants with reviews

food_safety.guidelines: Street food generally safe. Avoid raw vegetables/salads. Ice usually safe in cities. Wash hands frequently.
food_safety.safe_options: Pad Thai from busy stalls, grilled meats, fresh coconuts, 7-11 packaged food

food_safety.guidelines: Street tacos usually safe if busy. Avoid agua fresca from street. Bottled water only. Peel fruits yourself.
food_safety.safe_options: Tacos from busy stands, elote, chain restaurants, sealed drinks

food_safety.guidelines: Generally safe. Check health ratings (A/B grade displayed). Avoid expired food. Tap water safe to drink.
food_safety.safe_options: Restaurants with visible health grades, major chains, food trucks with permits

food_safety.guidelines: Avoid street food in Rio/São Paulo. Restaurants generally safe. Peel fruits. Bottled water in some areas.
food_safety.safe_options: Churrascarias, por kilo restaurants, açaí from reputable places

cultural_guidelines.dress: Modest clothing. Cover shoulders/knees at temples. Remove shoes at religious sites.
cultural_guidelines.gestures: Head wobble = yes. Right hand for eating/giving. Don't point feet at people.
cultural_guidelines.etiquette: Ask before photographing people. PDA not common. Bargaining expected at markets.

cultural_guidelines.dress: Modest at temples. Cover shoulders/knees. Remove shoes indoors.
cultural_guidelines.gestures: Wai greeting (hands together). Don't touch heads. Feet are lowest, don't point at people/Buddha.
cultural_guidelines.etiquette: Don't disrespect Buddha images. Respect monks. Don't touch monks if you're female.

cultural_guidelines.dress: Casual fine. Modest in churches. Beachwear only at beach.
cultural_guidelines.gestures: Close talking distance normal. Greet with handshake/kiss on cheek.
cultural_guidelines.etiquette: Say buenos días/buenas tardes. Tipping 10-15% expected. Learn basic Spanish appreciated.

cultural_guidelines.dress: Very casual accepted. Smart casual for nice restaurants.
cultural_guidelines.gestures: Personal space important (arm's length). Direct eye contact = confidence.
cultural_guidelines.etiquette: Tipping 15-20% mandatory. Small talk common. Queue culture strict.

cultural_guidelines.dress: Casual, beachwear common. Dress up for nice places at night.
cultural_guidelines.gestures: Close distance normal. Greeting kiss on both cheeks. Thumbs up OK.
cultural_guidelines.etiquette: Late arrival acceptable. Loud conversations normal. Learn basic Portuguese appreciated.

Brazil.food: Street R$10-30, Restaurant R$40-100, Water R$3-5

area_specific_warnings.avoid_areas: Patpong late night (pickpockets), quiet sois after midnight
area_specific_warnings.timing: BTS/MRT safe all hours, Grab safer than tuk-tuk at night

area_specific_warnings.avoid_areas: Downtown after dark, empty beaches at night
area_specific_warnings.safe_areas: Hotel zone, major resorts, Playa del Carmen main area
area_specific_warnings.timing: Stay in tourist zones after dark, use taxis not buses at night

area_specific_warnings.avoid_areas: Empty subway cars late night, certain parts of Bronx/Brooklyn
area_specific_warnings.safe_areas: Manhattan tourist areas 24/7, Brooklyn well-lit streets
area_specific_warnings.timing: Subway safe but stay in middle cars at night

area_specific_warnings.avoid_areas: Favelas without tour, empty beaches at night, Centro after dark
area_specific_warnings.safe_areas: Copacabana/Ipanema during day, Shopping malls, Leblon
area_specific_warnings.timing: Don't walk streets after 10 PM, use Uber
